title: played with trolling duo months ago.... months later there still at it!
body:
the system works! "THEY'RE" cant edit the title

so i played a game were i got trolled by a duo which mid game by the comments they made i thought i might have played with them before, scrolling through op.gg and sure enough they were there in a game of mine a couple of months ago and look to have been just trolling ever since.

{{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}}  best system hands down.

replies.body: im sure if they trolled every game then they would be punished. also they may have been banned earlier and a re close to a perma now. maybe the system does work.
